trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around September 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming back home from a late night run to the grocery store and saw a weird object in the sky in front of my house. It was a triangular shaped object (I didn't see an actual triangle, but i saw three lights that made me think it must have been a triangle) the lights were blue red and green. It wasn't moving like a plane or a helicopter but sideways. I lost sight of it behind a building.
